```py
>>> s1 = pd.Series({'falcon': 330.0, 'eagle': 160.0})
>>> s1
falcon    330.0
eagle     160.0
dtype: float64
>>> s2 = pd.Series({'falcon': 345.0, 'eagle': 200.0, 'duck': 30.0})
>>> s2
falcon    345.0
eagle     200.0
duck       30.0
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> s1.combine(s2, max)
duck        NaN
eagle     200.0
falcon    345.0
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> s1.combine(s2, max, fill_value=0)
duck       30.0
eagle     200.0
falcon    345.0
dtype: float64 
```
